text: The Dig is a 2018 Irish film.The Dig The directors are Andy Tohill and Ryan Tohill, and the screenplay was written by Stuart Drennan. The Dig was screened at the Toronto International Film Festival and was produced by Brian J Falconer for northern Irish firm Out of Orbit. ==Plot== A father becomes obsessed with finding the body of his murdered daughter. The murderer is released from jail after serving a 15-year sentence and decides to help find the body.thefilmstage.com The Dig review Jared Mobarak, September 9, 2018 ==References== ==External links== * * Category:2018 films Category:British films Category:Irish films Category:British thriller films Category:Irish thriller films Category:English-language films
title: The Dig (2018 film)
